feat.value: Oh you guilty on your part who allow Satan to come in,
defiling the holy places of God.
And you defile his temple which is you yourselves.
Didn’t you remember the prohibition of the apostle,
“he who will defile the temple of God, that one God will destroy.”
Nor still did you remember all the curses which our father said as he gave all of us into the hand of God saying:
“he is cursed, he who will defile his body in any form,
or steal anything, from a string to a lace.”
Most of all clothes and robes and hoods. And down to the least of things of eating.
Whether out of the service of God or out of the shares of those next to them
I actually thought to come to you in good faith,
but the sorrow of those who have enraged God and pained his holy ghost, is what has hindered our joy.
I know that every suffering is my fate, but if God with our Lord Jesus is doing his will, I come to you in a rage.
And I will do to these unwise ones and these foolish virgins, who have no oil in their vessels all those things that are in my heart.
That still again you return back to these provocations of God you fall down by the sword of the wicked one who has destroyed all of civilization in his sins and acts of lawlessness.
For you have loved defilement rather than purification, and you have chosen death for you rather than life.
For you have angered him who has created you, and who has nourished you, God who is forever.
And you have also given suffering to her who has nursed you, Jerusalem, which is the congregation.
And you have fallen in daylight like those who are in midnight.
As it is written: “she has stumbled, she has fallen, that is the virgin of Israel and so she won’t get up again.
For “those who sleep,” he said, “it’s at night that they sleep. And those who are drunk, it’s at night that they’re drunk”.
But as for you, you’ve drunk in day like those of whom it is said:
“those who are drunk without wine ”.
And you have slept in daylight like those who sleep in the night.
For you have left the fear of God behind you;
as you have loved darkness instead of light;
and as you have also thought what’s bitter to be sweet, and what’s sweet to be bitter.
Because of this, woe to you evil ones that you did not think of all the toil that our father has endured with all of you.
As you have left behind his teachings of life and those of the petitions of your fathers.
Furthermore, behold the elders go with their brothers
they came to you another time.
As we live in a great grief and much heart ache.
To have them done one by one by you according to their worth.
Since you have left the flow of the water of life behind you.
While you dug yourselves pits that are broken in making your hearts of foolishness do wrong to you.
While you say: 'we are clever'.
You have been foolish.
While you have changed the honor of God in your actions which are unworthy.
For this reason, God has laid you down to torments, which are written, that is stealing and defilement and every kind of evil.
Those things which every vengence will happen to those that commit them.
Not just in this world but in the other one.
